scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3013 --no-hot
scripts.serve:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3013
scripts.serve:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3013 --no-hot
scripts.e2e: pnpm exec cypress run --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3013 --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:development: pnpm exec cypress open --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3013 --browser electron
